introduction.title: I'm Oleksandr Pryvalov
introduction.paragraph1: A front-end developer with an interest in coding and art, appreciating clarity in both fields. I'm looking for projects where I can apply what I've learned and continue to develop my skills.
introduction.paragraph2: When I'm not coding, I enjoy creating oil paintings. These two interests help me balance logic with creativity.
introduction.paragraph3: I'm finishing my training as a web integrator at OpenClassrooms, equipping myself with the fundamentals in front-end development. Take a look at my {projects} to see what I've worked on so far, or check my {CV} for a complete overview.

form.contactInvitation: Ask me anything here or send an email directly to
form.name: Name

projectDescriptions.argent_bank_description: This project involves developing the front-end of a banking application with React and Redux.
projectDescriptions.724events_description: This project involves debugging and finalizing the development of a one-page website.
projectDescriptions.kasa_description: This project involves developing the front-end of an application using React and React Router.
projectDescriptions.sophie_bluel_description: This project involves developing a dynamic web page for an interior architect using JavaScript and an API.
projectDescriptions.print_it_description: This project involves enhancing a static printing company website by creating an interactive carousel with JavaScript.
projectDescriptions.ohmyfood_description: This project involves developing a mobile-first interface for a startup's website.
projectDescriptions.booki_description: This project involves creating the homepage of a travel agency using HTML and CSS.
projectDescriptions.riding_cities_description: This project involves updating an association's web page using HTML, in accordance with the provided mockups.
projectDescriptions.art_portfolio_description: A portfolio showcasing my art. This project taught me the importance of wireframing before starting to code. I'm currently designing a new portfolio.
